drug.name: CMC 001
drug.description: CMC 001 is an orally administered MRI contrast agent in development for enhancement of the liver, bile ducts and gastrointestinal tract.

article.citation: Thomsen HS, Barentsz JO, Burcharth F, Chabanova E, Dekker HM, Moesgaard F, Moller JM, Leth-Espensen P, Logager V, Takahashi S: Initial clinical experience with oral manganese (CMC-001) for liver MR imaging. Eur Radiol. 2007 Jan;17(1):273-8. Epub 2006 Jun 9.
Thomsen HS, Loegager V, Noergaard H, Chabanova E, Moller JM, Sonne J: Oral manganese for liver imaging at three different field strengths. Acad Radiol. 2004 Jun;11(6):630-6.

drug.indication: Investigated for use/treatment in liver cancer.
drug.mechanism-of-action: CMC 001 is used to screen liver tumors/metastases, imaging of the biliary tract and it could be suitable for liver function studies by following the metabolism and excretion of manganese in the liver cells. Several advantages like better images, higher safety, lower costs and less inconvenience for the patient can be expected.
